meta_description: ¿Por qué la disponibilidad separa a las plantas reactivas de las predictivas en 2026? Domine el cálculo, la estrategia y el impacto financiero de este KPI
title: Disponibilidad: La Clave para Transformar el Mantenimiento en un Motor de Rentabilidad Industrial

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Disponibilidad: La Clave para Transformar el Mantenimiento en un Motor de Rentabilidad Industrial

image_prompt: A high-end, photo-realistic industrial scene in a modern 2026 manufacturing facility. A diverse group of three professionals—a female maintenance manager in a white hard hat and high-visibility vest, and two male technicians in blue uniforms and safety glasses—are standing near a large, clean, high-tech automated production line. One technician is pointing towards a section of the machinery, while the manager holds a rugged industrial tablet (showing only the back of the device). The environment is brightly lit, organized, and reflects advanced technology with visible sensors and clean flooring. All individuals are wearing full appropriate PPE. No text or screens are visible. Full-body shot showing the scale of the industrial equipment.
